channel.title: Compiler Error with Gmaul spec

item.title: Compiler Error with Gmaul spec
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

Read the compiler. If it says: “REQUIRED: int” and “FOUND: boolean” there’s a huge hint on what’s wrong.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler Error with Gmaul spec
item.dc:creator: @Code_kai Code kai
item.description:
@Code_kai wrote:

I get this error when trying to add a granite maul special.

[code]src\rs2\model\combat\CombatAssistant.java:728: error: method calculateMeleeMaxHi
t in class CombatAssistant cannot be applied to given types;
damage = Misc.random(c.g
etCombat().calculateMeleeMaxHit());

      ^

required: boolean
found: no arguments
reason: actual and formal argument lists differ in length
src\rs2\model\combat\CombatAssistant.java:735: error: method handleHitMask in cl
ass Player cannot be applied to given types;
o.handleHitMask(damage);

                                                     ^

required: int,int,int,int,boolean
found: int
reason: actual and formal argument lists differ in length
src\rs2\model\combat\CombatAssistant.java:749: error: method calculateMeleeMaxHi
t in class CombatAssistant cannot be applied to given types;
int damage = Misc.random(c.getCo
mbat().calculateMeleeMaxHit());

  ^

required: boolean
found: no arguments
reason: actual and formal argument lists differ in length
Note: src\rs2\world\map\I.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
3 errors
Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

How do I fix this?

11views and no reply…

Read full topic
